review: Absolutely love our Fire TV. Easy set up and operation with a TON of things to watch. We loved it so much, we bought one for our kids playroom so they could watch what they wanted in their without hogging our tv. My 6 yo and 2 yo know how to operate the remove and find shows they want. The parental controls leave a little to be desired. It seems it is EVERYTHING IS LOCKED DOWN or NOTHING IS LOCKED DOWN.  Id like to be able to have more control of how it locks down and what it does. But, I really am please with this device and I suggest them to everyone. We actually got rid of cable and just have Fire TV.
